thread.section_title: Euroflorist Norge omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Euroflorist Norge | euroflorist.no
thread.title: Espen

author: Espen
title: Espen
text: This was the first time I ever used Euroflorist, and from this experience I know I will definetly use them again. I could sit here in Norway and order flowers for my girlfriend who is away in Russia for a few months, and she got them the same day. She sent me pictures of the flowers and they looked beautiful. The only two things I wish would be much clearer on the site is when the delivery time is - the flowers were delivered at about 20.00 russian time. And also, when you are optioned to choose the size of the bouquet, you should get a picture which showed what it would look like. I chose the largest one just to be sure, and it looked great. A medium bouquet will most likely also look good, but if you are buying for someone you love I believe the smallest one is not a good option. Anyway, great site and great experience
